mc.name: Myr Propagator
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Put a token that's a copy of Myr Propagator onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Put a token that's a copy of Myr Propagator onto the battlefield.
mc.flavorText:
"We will ingest and remake this world in our image, not unlike some admirable designs I have seen here."
--Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

mc.name: Cerebral Eruption
mc.oracleText: Target opponent reveals the top card of his or her library. Cerebral Eruption deals damage equal to the revealed card's converted mana cost to that player and each creature he or she controls. If a land card is revealed this way, return Cerebral Eruption to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: Target opponent reveals the top card of his or her library. Cerebral Eruption deals damage equal to the revealed card's converted mana cost to that player and each creature he or she controls. If a land card is revealed this way, return Cerebral Eruption to its owner's hand.

Flying

mc.printedText:

{3}{R}: Destroy target artifact. Hoard-Smelter Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that artifact's converted mana cost.

mc.name: Venser's Journal
mc.oracleText:
You have no maximum hand size.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in your hand.
mc.printedText:
You have no maximum hand size.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in your hand.
mc.flavorText: A Planeswalker's chronicle spans worlds and civilizations, each page a lifetime.

mc.name: Engulfing Slagwurm
mc.oracleText: Whenever Engulfing Slagwurm blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
mc.printedText: Whenever Engulfing Slagwurm blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
mc.flavorText: Its teeth exist only for decoration.

mc.name: Asceticism
mc.oracleText:
Creatures you control can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.
{1}{G}: Regenerate target creature.
mc.printedText:
Creatures you control can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.
{1}{G}: Regenerate target creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Let my ignominy build walls thicker than iron and stronger than darksteel."
--Thrun, the last troll

{2}: Regenerate Molten-Tail Masticore.

mc.name: Kemba, Kha Regent
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a 2/2 white Cat creature token onto the battlefield for each Equipment attached to Kemba, Kha Regent.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a 2/2 white Cat creature token onto the battlefield for each Equipment attached to Kemba, Kha Regent.
mc.flavorText: "I am not Raksha. I never will be. But I refuse to be the kha who watched her pride be torn asunder."

mc.name: Platinum Emperion
mc.oracleText: Your life total can't change. (You can't gain or lose life. You can't pay any amount of life except 0.)
mc.printedText: Your life total can't change. (You can't gain or lose life. You can't pay any amount of life except 0.)
mc.flavorText: It ignores such insignificant forces as time, entropy, and death.

mc.name: Kuldotha Forgemaster
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice three artifacts: Search your library for an artifact card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice three artifacts: Search your library for an artifact card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: The goblins say it used to be larger, before it began to stoke the Great Furnace with pieces of itself.

mc.name: Etched Champion
mc.oracleText: Metalcraft- Etched Champion has protection from all colors as long as you control three or more artifacts.
mc.printedText: Metalcraft -- Etched Champion has protection from all colors as long as you control three or more artifacts.
mc.flavorText: Its predecessors were etched with the wisdom of ancients; its own etchings bear warnings of a future fraught with war.

mc.name: Ogre Geargrabber
mc.oracleText: Whenever Ogre Geargrabber attacks, gain control of target Equipment an opponent controls until end of turn. Attach it to Ogre Geargrabber. When you lose control of that Equipment, unattach it.
mc.printedText: Whenever Ogre Geargrabber attacks, gain control of target Equipment an opponent controls until end of turn. Attach it to Ogre Geargrabber. When you lose control of that Equipment, unattach it.
mc.flavorText: Long reach, short attention span.

mc.name: Memoricide
mc.oracleText: Name a nonland card. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
mc.printedText: Name a nonland card. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
mc.flavorText: "You claim wisdom, yet I see nothing in here but tawdry wishes."
